speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I’m doing well, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m reaching out regarding your outstanding balance with ABC Credit. To proceed, can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your address for verification?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming your details. Your current balance is $250.00. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can make a payment today through my bank account.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I'll guide you through the process. Just a moment please.

speaker: Agent
text: Please provide your bank account details for the transaction.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! I will process the payment now. You’ll receive a confirmation shortly.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, Mark. I appreciate your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day!
